name: OpenLink Data Explorer
description: Adds Linked Data browsing functionality -- across public or private networks -- to host browser.
content_security_policy: script-src https://maps.google.com https://maps.googleapis.com https://mts0.googleapis.com https://mts1.googleapis.com https://maps.gstatic.com 'self' 'unsafe-eval' chrome-extension://lib; object-src https://maps.google.com https://maps.googleapis.com https://mts0.googleapis.com https://mts1.googleapis.com https://maps.gstatic.com 'self' chrome-extension://lib;
